data.title: Shuttle Service
data.meta_description: View shuttle bus routes at the 2024 Annual Meeting to get from hotels to the Javits Center.
data.text:
A 2024 meeting badge is required to ride on the courtesy shuttle bus. The Javits Center will serve as the hub for all shuttle bus routes. Scroll down for a list of operating hours, hotels on routes, and more.

2024 New York Hotel Map (.pdf)

Download and view the New York Hotel Map to view hotel locations in the city. For help viewing and understanding this document, please contact [email protected].

Hours of Operation

Saturday, May 4, 2024 • 7:00 a.m. – 8:15 p.m.

Sunday, May 5, 2024 • 7:00 a.m. – 8:00 p.m.

Monday, May 6, 2024 • 7:00 a.m. – 7:30 p.m.

Tuesday, May 7, 2024 • 7:00 a.m. – 5:30 p.m.

Wednesday, May 8, 2024 • 7:00 a.m. – 5:30 p.m.

Walking Distance Hotels, NOT on shuttle bus routes:

The York, New York

Four Points Midtown West

Route 1 – Red

Renaissance NY Times Square – Lobby Entrance

Crowne Plaza Times Square – at Renaissance NY

Home2 Suites Times Square – at Renaissance NY

Hampton Times Square – at Renaissance NY

Marriott Marquis – 45th Street Entrance

W New York Times Square – at Marriott 45th Street Entrance

Route 2 – Yellow

Holiday Inn Times Square – Across 8th Avenue at bus stop by Upside Pizza

Hyatt Place – Holiday Inn Stop Across 8th Avenue at bus stop by Upside Pizza

Westin Times Square – 8th Avenue Lobby Entrance

Hilton Times Square – at Westin, 8th Avenue Entrance

Intercontinental Times Square – at Westin, 8th

Route 3 – Blue

Sheraton NY Times Square – Across 7th Avenue from Lobby

New York Hilton Midtown – At Sheraton, Across 7th Avenue, from Lobby

Route 4 – Green

Crowne Plaza HY36 Midtown – W 36th Street, Lobby Entrance

Homewood Suites Times Square South – at Crowne Plaza W 36th St. Lobby Entrance

Fairfield Inn & Suites Times Square South - at Crowne Plaza W 36th St. Lobby Entrance

Springhill Suites Times Square South - at Crowne Plaza W 36th St. Lobby Entrance

Courtyard Times Square West - at Crowne Plaza W 36th St. Lobby Entrance

Wyndham New Yorker – at Corner of W 34th St. and 8th Avenue

Fairfield Inn and Suites Penn Station - at Wyndham New Yorker Stop, Corner of W 34th St. and 8th Ave.

EVEN Hotel Times Square South - at Wyndham New Yorker Stop, Corner of W 34th St. and 8th Ave.

Hotels in bold indicate hotel pick-up and drop off locations. Shuttle buses will not pick up at each hotel, you must go to the closest shuttle stop to board the bus to and from the Javits Center. Buses departures from Javits will be at the building entrance.

Shuttle information signs will be posted in the lobby of each shuttle hotel. Check the sign in your hotel lobby for additional information and changes.

During operating hours, real-time shuttle pickup information can be found utilizing the ETS NextShuttle App, located within the APA Meetings App.
